account_banned_detail: Your account has been suspended, contact the administrator for more information
account_disconnected_detail: Account connection has been removed successfully
change_password_admin_desc: Change the user's password. This will immediately invalidate the current password and all active sessions.
change_password_desc: Change your password. This will log you out from all outher active sessions.
connect_accounts_desc: Connecting external accounts allows you to log in using those services.
empty_content_desc: It seemed that you have arrived at a desolate land where no data exists.
export_data_large_records: This export will be quite large. Suggest applying more filters.
export_data_no_records: There are no records to export.
export_data_too_many_records: The number of records to be exported exceeds the maximum limit. Only the first {max} records will be exported.
exporting_data_detail: Please wait while your data is being prepared for export
incorrect_username_or_password: Incorrect username or password. If you forgot your password, please contact the administrator
password_mismatch_detail: The new passwords you entered do not match
password_updated_detail: The password has been updated successfully
password_weak_detail: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and digits
password_weak_detected_detail: For your account security, it is recommended to change your password to a stronger one in account settings
proceed_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to proceed?
profile_updated_detail: The profile information has been saved successfully
request_error_403: ╮(╯_╰)╭ You do not have permission to perform this action
request_error_404: (⊙_⊙;) The content you are looking for does not exist
request_error_429: ヽ(￣～￣)ノ Too many requests, please try again later
request_error_500: Σ(;ﾟдﾟ) Server error, please contact the administrator
submission_result_detail: Your submission #{solutionId} has been judged as {judgeStatus}

user_management_cannot_operate_desc: You do not have permission to operate on this user, their privilege is not lower than yours.

username_already_taken: Username already taken, please choose another one
username_invalid_detail: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
